trans-unit.source: Provides helper methods that can be used by control designers to generate sample data for data-bound properties at design time.
This class cannot be inherited.
Creates a <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"></xref> object that contains three columns with names indicating that the columns are connected to a data source.
The table is not actually bound to a data source.
Each column name simply indicates that it is a data-bound column.
The column data types are string, integer, and string.
The calling designer component must add rows and data to the resulting table.
A new <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"></xref> object with three columns and no data.
Creates a <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"></xref> object that contains three columns with names that indicate that the columns contain sample data.
The column data types are all string.
The calling designer component can call the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignTimeData.GetDesignTimeDataSource%2A> method to add rows of data to the resulting table.
A new <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"></xref> with three columns.
These columns can contain data of type string.
Creates a sample <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"></xref> object with the same schema as the provided data.
The data types that can be created are the primitive types, such as number, string, and date types.
Any other types are replaced by columns of type `String`.
The calling designer component can call the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignTimeData.GetDesignTimeDataSource%2A> method to add rows of data to the resulting table.
A data source with the desired schema to use as the format for the sample <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"></xref> object.
A object that contains columns with the same names and data types as the provided referenceData.
Creates a <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"></xref> object with the same schema as the provided data and optionally containing column names indicating that the data is bound data.
The data types that can be created are the primitive types, such as number, string, and date types.
Any other types are replaced by columns of type `String`.
The calling designer component can use <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignTimeData.GetDesignTimeDataSource%2A> to add rows of data to the resulting table.
An <xref href="System.Collections.IEnumerable"></xref> object containing data.
If `true`, the column names indicate that they contain bound data.
A <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"></xref> object.
Gets an event handler for data binding.
Gets a collection of property descriptors for the data fields of the specified data source.
The data source from which to retrieve the data fields.
A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection"></xref> object that describes the data fields of the specified data source.
Gets the specified data member from the specified data source.
This method searches the specified data source for the specified data member.
If `dataMember` is `null`, the first data member in the specified data source is returned.
An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IListSource"></xref> that contains the data in which to find the member.
The name of the data member to retrieve.
An object implementing <xref href="System.Collections.IEnumerable"></xref> containing the specified data member from the specified data source, if it exists.
dataSource is `null`
-or-
dataMember is `null`.
Gets the names of the data members in the specified data source.
The data source from which to retrieve the names of the members.
An array of type `String` that contains the names of the data members in the specified data source.
Adds the specified number of sample rows to the specified data table.
The <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"></xref> object to which the sample rows are added.
The minimum number of rows to add.
An object implementing <xref href="System.Collections.IEnumerable"></xref> containing sample data for use at design time.
Gets a data source selected by name in the design host, represented by the specified component's site property and identified by the specified data source name.
The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IComponent"></xref> object that contains the data source.
The name of the data source to retrieve.

An object implementing either <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IListSource"></xref> or <xref href="System.Collections.IEnumerable"></xref> representing the selected data source, or `null` if the data source or the designer host could not be accessed.
Gets a data source selected by name in the design host, represented by the specified component's site property and identified by the specified data-source name and member name.
The object implementing <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IComponent"></xref> that contains the data sourced property.
The data source to retrieve.
The data member to retrieve.
An object implementing <xref href="System.Collections.IEnumerable"></xref> containing the data member, or `null` if the data source, member, or component's site could not be accessed.
